description: It does what it is supposed to do. Flatpak is the way. Just install this version.

The best flight controller software for freestyle and racing with a straight forward configuration tool in case you need to tweak the sane defaults.

Betaflight supports plethora of hardware and yet the amount of exposed options is kept as a sane number. Two thumbs up!
summary: Straight forward tool for flashing and configuration

description: The flathub version is not maintained, it hasn't been updated since 2018, there is an open pull request that hasn't been actioned. Skip the flathub version.
summary: The flathub version is not maintained
